ovdesc.p: This screen is to store reachability of another bank through the CHATS clearing.Clearing House Automated Transfer System, or CHATS, is a Real Time Gross Settlement (RTGS) system for the transfer of funds in Hong Kong.

desc.p: Specifies the date until which the record is to be considered as active for payments processing.Post this date, the record will be set as Inactive by the payments hub.
Date and Time when the record was created in DD MON 2015 HH:MM:SS.MMM format
User ID of the record creator
This System generated ID will uniquely define the CHATS Directory entry
Holds name of the institution.
BIC Code of the CHATS member bank.
Controls the record entry through automatic upload process.
Possible Values
Y – The entry is manually updated and can be overridden by the upload process.
N – The entry is manual updated and the upload process should not override it.
Holds the type of relationship the member bank holds with CHATS clearing.
Possible Values:
DP - Direct Participant
IP - Indirect Participant
ICU - Indirect Chart User
Record Activation Code generated for the record by the payment's hub.
Possible values:
N - Not active
A - Active
H - History
F - Future
C - Not active future
Record Status Code generated for the record by the payments hub.
Possible values:
L - Live
U - Unapproved
R - Reversed
Date and Time when the record was approved in DD MON 2015 HH:MM:SS.MMM format
Specifies the date from which the record is to be considered as active for payments processing.
BIC Code of the bank to be reached.
User ID of the record approver
This System generated ID will uniquely define the CHATS Directory entry
Holds the Clearing code for which this record is created.
Holds the Clearing code for the Member Bank.
Holds the Clearing code for the Bank to be reached.
Indicates the company ID for which the record is created.
The value links to the field ‘CompanyID’ in PPT.COMPANY
Holds the Clearing Currency for which this CHATS directory record is created.
Possible Values:
HKD(HongKong Dollar)
CNY(Chinese Yuan)
EUR(Euro)
USD(US Dollar)
Holds the BIC Code of the Direct Participant
If the member identifier is a DP then this BIC is the same as the Member
Identifier
If the member identifier is a IP or ICU then this BIC corresponds to the BIC of the Direct Participant.
